txt.en: 'What is this? You have slain a high ranking two-headed troll? I praise you for your efforts and your talents, [placeholder].'

'Deep within the caverns of Gloomingtarn are rich mineral deposits. The journey there is not an easy one. However, we need the flint there for the fires and forges. Are you willing to take on this task?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest. This quest can be completed with one or two adventurers.</rgb>
Mineral riches await those who brave the craggy caverns of Gloomingtarn.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
You should return to Zádokh Flint-eye and apprise him of your efforts.
